author: bridge-bot
content: <etan_status> Initially, it was only supported by Lodestar / Nimbus so was just everyone (because not guaranteed that theres someone part of the sync committee that runs those minority mpl). When Prsym or Lighthouse have impls ready it can be restricted to the sync committee if libp2p doesnt behave efficiently when the same msg is sent by multiple peers.
